resources.string: Information about the latest app updates. Icon is a flag when there are new updates to see and a tick when all updates have been viewed.

- Filters added to view scores screen.\n- Outdoor classification tables are now fully correct and available.\n- New archer info section: enter your current handicap to see allowance for round on the round stats screen.

- Track the number of arrows shot without scoring by swapping the type from ‘Score’ to ‘Count’ on the new score screen.
- Select round filters now work.
- Round stats now have some extra information like viewing past scores.
- Allowance for round added to handicap tables
- Updates to the handicap calculations to exactly match AGB tables. Note this may have caused some handicaps to change slightly.
- Added a faces selector to rounds screen for partial faces e.g. half or triple.\n- Added options to edit all sight marks at once.
- All handicaps now use the Archery GB 2023 handicap system by default.
- Go to settings to swap back to the old David Lane handicap system.
